short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record Demos of your App in Seconds

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create high-quality demos directly from your browser using an extension.

Features:
- Record directly from the browser
- Zoom in/out on buttons and links
- Augmented mouse with smooth movement
- Show shortcuts
- Export to MP4, WebM
